actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Concurrent resolution calling for a rededication of candidates for public office and the American people to the spirit of independence and self-reliance as espoused by our Founding Fathers.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that candidates for Federal office should not promise material benefits to voting blocs in exchange for electoral support. Urges the American people to view with skepticism political candidates who seek to buy their vote by offering them future appropriations from the Public Treasury. Calls for a restoration of the spirit of independence and self-reliance.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution calling for a rededication of candidates for public office and the American people to the spirit of independence and self-reliance as espoused by our Founding Fathers.
